name: Halo but like, really bad.
description:
This game was made in about 2-3 days.

I mean hey, it looks more Halo-ish than you would imagine.

Pressing Start in the main menu will result in you being put in one of 3 maps
with alot of bots that you can kill.
There are also guns you can pickup (almost like real halo omg 😲😲).

You can also press your "P" key on your keyboard to add another player into the
game.

WHAT??!?? SPLIT-SCREEN?!??! ITS ALMOST LIKE ADDING SPLIT SCREEN ISN'T AS HARD AS 343 THINKS IT IS?!?!? 😲😲🤯🤯🤯

little note, in split-screen, player one always plays with keyboard and mouse while the other players are allocated to their controllers.
